title: Lightweight Pfadfinder EVO is a lightweight carbon gravel wheelset for 40mm tires
content:
German high-end carbon road and gravel wheel manufacturers, Lightweight, are rolling out the all-new Lightweight Pfadfinder EVO disc wheelset. Based roughly on the Wegweiser EVO carbon road wheels, the Pfadfinder EVO can accommodate wider 40mm tires, in-line with the trend for higher volume tires. Lightweight Pfadfinder EVO The new Lightweight Pfadfinder EVO wheelset is disc

The post Lightweight Pfadfinder EVO is a lightweight carbon gravel wheelset for 40mm tires appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
